attributes.action: Remove 2nd and 8 day COVID test when enter to UK form abroad.
attributes.additional_details: Enough that you need to do the test before the flight .... Cancel the tests on the 2nd and 8th days after arriving from abroad !!! Why should we pay crazy money for the fact that we sit at home for 10 days upon arrival, and  while sitting at home to do your idiotic tests, which cost a lot of money !!!! Why should we pay to visit our relatives, our parents ... Our children did not see their grandparents for a whole year because of this shit that happens  in the world!!!!
attributes.background: It’s very expensive to pay for tests second and 8 day after returning to UK.Why I have to pay if I stay home for isolation anyway 10 days.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review testing and self-isolation requirements for arrivals to England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568602

Make COVID-19 tests during quarantine free or optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577612
